tasks.title: Document Management System
tasks.description: Implement secure document management system for contractor licenses and certifications
tasks.details:
Create a secure system for contractors to upload and manage their licenses and certifications with the following features:
- Secure file upload for multiple formats (PDF, JPG, PNG)
- Document expiration tracking
- OCR for automated verification
- Firebase Storage integration with security rules
- Document encryption
tasks.testStrategy:
- Test file upload with various formats and sizes
- Verify security rules prevent unauthorized access
- Test expiration tracking notifications
- Validate OCR accuracy on sample documents
- Verify encryption/decryption process
